_meanings:
{@--4@} Exhibition (of a 
person) for being seen and liked (by
the people); {#alokasAmAnyaguRastanUjaH#}
{#prarocanArTaM prakawIkftaSca#} <ls>Māl. 1. 10</ls> (where
<ls>Jagaddhara</ls> interprets {#prarocanArTaM#} by
{#pravfttipAwavArTaM#} ‘in order to be 
thoroughly acquainted with the world’).

{@--6@} 
Representation of the end as all but 
accomplished; see <ls>S. D. 388</ls>; ({#prarocanA#} also
in the last two senses).
